## Migration DDL

#### DDL

Script DDL untuk membuat tabel `idol`.

```sql
-- auto-generated definition
CREATE TABLE idol
(
    id            varchar(10) DEFAULT ('JKT48-'::text || NEXTVAL('idol_id_seq'::regclass)) NOT NULL
        CONSTRAINT idol_id_unique
            PRIMARY KEY,
    given_name    text                                                                     NOT NULL,
    family_name   text                                                                     NOT NULL,
    horoscope     text                                                                     NOT NULL,
    user_id       uuid                                                                     NOT NULL
        CONSTRAINT idol_user_id_unique
            UNIQUE
        CONSTRAINT idol_user_id_users_id_fk
            REFERENCES users
            ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE,
    bio           text,
    height        text,
    blood_type    text,
    instagram_url text,
    x_url         text
);

ALTER TABLE idol
    OWNER TO doadmin;

```

#### Seed Data

Beberapa data contoh yang bisa diinsertkan ke tabel `idol`.

```sql
INSERT INTO public.idol (id, given_name, family_name, horoscope, user_id, bio, height, blood_type, instagram_url, x_url) VALUES ('JKT48-1', 'Shania', 'Gracia', 'Scorpio', '665656ba-4937-4dc0-b120-ca19bf047733', 'Shania Gracia', '160 cm', 'O', 'https://www.instagram.com/shaniagracia/', 'https://www.instagram.com/shaniagracia/');
INSERT INTO public.idol (id, given_name, family_name, horoscope, user_id, bio, height, blood_type, instagram_url, x_url) VALUES ('JKT48-2', 'Gabryela', 'Wijaya', 'Scorpio', 'cb4292f2-fc77-4fa2-950d-f2a98e3b1bb7', 'Gabryela Wijaya', '160 cm', 'O', 'https://www.instagram.com/gabryela.wijaya/', 'https://www.instagram.com/gabryela.wijaya/');
```

## Columns

#### id

- **Type:** `string`
- **Required:** `true`
- **Description:** ID unik dari idol.

```bash
{
  "id": "JKT48-1",
}
```

#### given_name

- **Type:** `string`
- **Required:** `true`
- **Description:** Nama depan dari idol.

```bash
{
  "given_name": "Shania",
}
```

#### family_name

- **Type:** `string`
- **Required:** `true`
- **Description:** Nama belakang dari idol.

```bash
{
  "family_name": "Gracia",
}
```

#### horoscope

- **Type:** `string`
- **Required:** `true`
- **Description:** Zodiak dari idol.

```bash
{
  "horoscope": "Scorpio",
}
```
